summary: The module defines a custom Stable Diffusion XL image‑to‑image pipeline that incorporates mask handling, allowing selective alteration of specified regions in an input picture while preserving the rest of the image. It manages latent preparation, denoising validation, and conversion of the model output back to a visual format.
business_intent: Enable developers, designers, and content creators to perform targeted AI‑driven edits on images—such as inpainting, style changes, or localized enhancements—by leveraging a masked diffusion workflow that streamlines selective image manipulation.
